00013         // are propagated to the outline immediately.  See:
00014         // http://developer.apple.com/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/StoringNSColorInDefaults.html
00015         // at the bottom of the page, "Declare an NSColor property of the custom view class...."
